main event: A round blue-white object the size of a small marble was observed for 4 seconds.
interesting points: The object was stationary during the sighting.
The sighting occurred in Yellow Springs, Ohio on December 11, 1957.
The sighting was reported by a civilian witness.
The report indicates 'insufficient data' and 'no report in file'.
The document includes handwritten annotations and codes, suggesting it was part of the Project Blue Book investigation.
sighted object: a round blue-white object the size of a small marble
